headline: A Look At STERIS (STE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Recent share performance has put STERIS (STE) on many investors’ radars, with the stock showing gains over the past week, month, and past 3 months, alongside positive annual revenue and net income growth. See our latest analysis for STERIS. At a share price of $268.65, STERIS has seen a 10.84% 3 month share price return and a 25.00% 1 year total shareholder return, which indicates recent upward movement in the stock.
